data.prayer: Father, encourage the 2,963 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint-Laurent-du-Maroni, French Guiana
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Saint-Laurent-du-Maroni.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Saint-Laurent-du-Maroni, French Guiana.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Saint-Laurent-du-Maroni.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Saint-Laurent-du-Maroni a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Saint-Laurent-du-Maroni.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Saint-Laurent-du-Maroni, French Guiana. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
